data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 1, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 4, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Free kick Fluminense.
Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
Sao Paulo push forward at Morumbí and Reinaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
In the minute 12, Sao Paulo's Igor Vinicius gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 14, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Sao Paulo.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Nene of Fluminense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fluminense drives forward and Nene gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Yuri Lima (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In Sao Paulo Fluminense attack through Wellington Silva. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 17, Yuri Lima for Fluminense drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Sao Paulo's Paulinho breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Fluminense at Morumbí.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 25, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Igor Vinicius (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 30, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Gabriel of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Sao Paulo are coming forward and Diego gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Wellington Silva.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 42, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Morumbí.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Fluminense have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Hernanes for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Morumbí.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Fluminense's area.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Sao Paulo.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
The home team replace Hernanes with Igor Gomes.
Brenner is replacing Paulinho for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 46, Sao Paulo make their first substitution with Juanfran replacing Igor Vinicius.
In the minute 47, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In the minute 50, Goal! Brenner equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Leo Pele with an assist there.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 53, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Goal! Luciano gives Sao Paulo a 2-1 lead.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 58, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Juanfran misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 60, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's first substitution at Morumbí with Fernando Pacheco replacing Marcos Paulo.
In the minute 61, Ganso is replacing Michel Araujo for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
The match at Morumbí has been interrupted briefly for a check on Wellington Silva, who is down injured.
In the minute 65, The away team has substituted Wellington Silva with Luiz Henrique. Odair Hellmann is thus making his third change.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Luiz Henrique's header is off-target for Fluminense.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Important block from the Fluminense defence as Vitor Bueno fires in a strike for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 70, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Morumbí.
Fluminense's Luiz Henrique gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sao Paulo defender.
In the minute 71, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Sao Paulo.
Fluminense are pushing forward but Nene's finish is wide of the goal.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 81, Fluminense's Fernando Pacheco is whistled for offside at Morumbí.
The home team have replaced Gabriel with Luan. This is the fourth substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
Sao Paulo are coming forward and Luciano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Luiz Henrique (Fluminense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 85, Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a fourth substitution, with Felippe Cardoso replacing Yuri Lima.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Fluminense.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 89, Fluminense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Bruno Alves is on a sub for Luciano for Sao Paulo.
Fluminense's Nene is on target but unsuccessful.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Brenner for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Fluminense a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Brenner (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Sao Paulo extend their lead to 3-1 through Vitor Bueno.
Luan (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card.
